data.Name: Lori Gordon
data.staff_title: Sr. Manager for Finance and Administration
data.staff_bio: Lori joined the ICI team in June 2008, with over 20 years of experience in administration and finance in the non-profit and public sectors. Lori spent thirteen years in the budget office of WGBH Educational Foundation where she managed a portfolio of grants related to WGBH’s national series and children’s programming. She also trained staff on use of the Foundations financial system and in budgeting and grant reporting. Just before coming to ICI, Lori also worked as a finance manager for Reach Out and Read, a nonprofit organization whose mission is to promote family literacy through interactions between a child and his/her pediatrician at well visits. Lori’s entree into state government occurred earlier in her career when she worked in the marketing, human resources and operations departments of the Mass Bay Transportation Authority.
